abstract: Profile of Chris Dailey, associate head coach of University of Connecticut's women's basketball team; Dailey, who is helping team advance in this year's NCAA tournament, became assistant to coach Geno Auriemma in 1985, and has been part of power program's leadership through nine national titles.
lead_paragraph: Chris Dailey, an associate head coach at Connecticut who has been at Geno Auriemma’s side for 29 years, has helped mold championship teams and the program’s image.

headline.main: To Longtime Geno Auriemma Assistant, There’s No Better Place Than UConn
headline.print_headline: To a Longtime Auriemma Assistant, There’s No Better Place Than UConn

snippet: Chris Dailey, an associate head coach at Connecticut who has been at Geno Auriemma’s side for 29 years, has helped mold championship teams and the program’s image.
